message: Starting implementation: scanning repo for Streamlit files, main service entry, and logging setup.
Repo mapped. Implementing service_control helper and main Streamlit manager with tabs + log tailing.
Service control + log utils added; main Streamlit manager implemented with tabs and script-based process control + embedded UIs.
Delivered ald_service_manager app + service_control utilities, wired to launcher scripts, with logs, PLC tester and parameter UI embedding, and debug runners.
